select P.* , C.CATEGORY_KEY , C.CATEGORY_NAV FROM( select * from PRODUCT where prod_writer = 'aaa123'
and prod_name like concat('%',#{searchName},'%')
and prod_content like concat('%',#{searchName},'%')
and str_to_date(prod_enddate , '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{startDate} , '%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(prod_enddate , '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endDate} , '%Y-%m-%d')
order by
prod_price asc,
prod_price desc,
prod_id desc limit #{pageStart} , #{amount} ) P LEFT JOIN (SELECT CONCAT(A1.group_ID, A1.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_KEY, ##카테고리 키 (그룹 + 키 형태로 카테고리분류) CASE A1.category_parent_LV WHEN 0 THEN A1.category_detail_NM WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT(A2.category_detail_NM,' > ', A1.category_detail_NM) WHEN 2 THEN CONCAT(A3.category_detail_NM, ' > ', A2.category_detail_NM,' > ', A1.category_detail_NM) END as CATEGORY_NAV FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY A1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY A2 ON A1.CATEGORY_PARENT_LV = A2.CATEGORY_LV AND A1.CATEGORY_DETAIL_PARENT_LV = A2.CATEGORY_DETAIL_LV AND A1.GROUP_ID = A2.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY A3 ON A2.CATEGORY_PARENT_LV = A3.CATEGORY_LV AND A2.CATEGORY_DETAIL_PARENT_LV = A3.CATEGORY_DETAIL_LV ORDER BY CATEGORY_NAV ASC) C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY = C.CATEGORY_KEY;
